actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend the limitation on waivers granted under section 212(h) of that Act to aliens unlawfully present in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the waiver of inadmissibility for criminal aliens unlawfully present in the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend the limitation on waivers granted under section 212(h) of that Act to aliens unlawfully present in the United States.
